name: Antlerman
description:
This game was created by two people in under 3 days for ludum dare 43!

Run the game in full screen for the best experience.

Each round, find the goal is to find the altar and sacrifice 20 blood.  you can then choose one of three available upgrades, in total there are six upgrades:

-max hp

-max attack

-shotgun

-missile

-lifesteal

-dash

The upgrades don't stack (yet), the enemies get more difficult every level. Try to get the highest score!
